Element.Name: 疼痛_1
Element.Caption: 30 points mild pain, too much activities can lead to moderate pain, Aspirin can cure the pain

Element.Name: 疼痛_1
Element.Caption: 20 points moderate pain,tolerable, some activities therefore were stopped, normal but limited activities, taking painkiller stronger than Aspirin

Element.Name: 疼痛_1
Element.Caption: 10 points frequent severe pain, normal but limited walk, always taking painkillers stronger than Aspirin

Element.Name: 疼痛_1
Element.Caption: 0 point extreme pain, always lying in bed

Element.Name: 助行装置_3
Element.Caption: 7 points the walking stick is needed in long walk

Element.Name: 助行装置_3
Element.Caption: 5 points the walking stick is needed in most of walk

Element.Name: 助行装置_3
Element.Caption: 3 points the walking stick is needed

Element.Name: 助行装置_3
Element.Caption: 2 points two walking sticks are needed

Element.Name: 上下楼梯_5
Element.Caption: 1 point walking up and down stairs in other ways

Element.Name: 上下楼梯_5
Element.Caption: 0 point unable to walk up and down stairs

Element.Name: 坐_7
Element.Caption: 5 points can sit comfortably in chairs with any height in more than one hour

Element.Name: 坐_7
Element.Caption: 3 points can sit comfortably in high chairs in more than half an hour

Element.Name: 坐_7
Element.Caption: 0 point can't sit in chairs with any height

Element.Name: 穿鞋袜_8
Element.Caption: 2 points difficult but can be done

Info.ID: 量表\测试\Harris髋关节评分标准

XTextDocument.BodyText:
Pain（44 points） ○44 points Never ○40 points sometimes in mild pain ○30 points mild pain, too much activities can lead to moderate pain, Aspirin can cure the pain ○20 points moderate pain,tolerable, some activities therefore were stopped, normal but limited activities, taking painkiller stronger than Aspirin ○10 points frequent severe pain, normal but limited walk, always taking painkillers stronger than Aspirin ○0 point extreme pain, always lying in bed Function（47 points） Walk Limp ○11 points never ○8 points mild ○5 points moderate ○0 point severe 0 Support of walk ○11 points unwanted ○7 points the walking stick is needed in long walk ○5 points the walking stick is needed in most of walk ○3 points the walking stick is needed ○2 points two walking sticks are needed ○0 point limp in two legs ○0 point can't walk Walking distance ○11 points no limits ○8 points 6 blocks, about 600m ○5 points 2-3 blocks, about 200-300m ○2 points indoor activities only ○0 point in bed only
Daily activities Walking up and down stairs ○4 points walking without handrail ○2 points walking with handrail ○1 point walking up and down stairs in other ways ○0 point unable to walk up and down stairs Public transportation ○1 point yes ○0 point no Sit ○5 points can sit comfortably in chairs with any height in more than one hour ○3 points can sit comfortably in high chairs in more than half an hour ○0 point can't sit in chairs with any height Wearing socks and shoes ○4 points easy ○2 points difficult but can be done ○0 point can't be done Motion of Joint（5 points） Bending 0-45° ()×1.0×0.05 0.00 0.00 46-90° ()×0.6×0.05 91-110° ()×0.3×0.05 Outreach 0-15° ()×0.8×0.05 0 16-20° ()×0.3×0.05 ≥21° Adduction 0-15° ()×0.2×0.05 0.00 ≥16° Outward rotation 0-15° ()×0.4×0.05 0.00 ≥16° Inward rotation at any angle Limb deformity（4 points） ○flexion contracture＜30° ○flexion contracture≥30° 0.00 ○adduction deformity＜10° ○adduction deformity≥10° ○inward rotation deformity＜10° ○inward rotation deformity≥10° ○unequal limb length＜3cm ○unequal limb length≥3cm Trendelenburg Trial （） Total 0 excellent（=> 90） good（80-89） fair（70-79） poor（< 70） Level：差
